meanings.definition: The birds of a particular region, habitat, or geological period.
meanings.sent1: The avifaunas in the forest include various species of birds.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the avifaunas of different continents to understand biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The avifaunas in the park put on a chirpy concert every morning.
meanings.sent4: The avifaunas of the island painted the sky with their colorful feathers.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the avifaunas of the past through fossils can reveal ancient ecosystems.

meanings.sent1: The avifaunas of the wetlands attract birdwatchers from far and wide.
meanings.sent2: Local conservation efforts aim to protect the avifaunas of the valley.
meanings.sent3: The avifaunas of the city park seem to have their own social gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The avifaunas of the mountains soar high above the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The avifaunas near the lake create a symphony of chirps and tweets.
